title: He Can’t Stop Looking At Butts
itunes:title: He Can’t Stop Looking At Butts
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m dating an awesome guy and he treats me very well. Anything I want or need, he supplies for me. He’s a gentleman and our sex life is great. There’s just one problem... He has a bad habit of looking at other women’s butts. We could be on a date and he will stare at another woman’s butt as she’s standing there. If she’s walking away, he follows her with his eyes. We may be hugged up, having dinner, grocery shopping or driving down a street, he does not care.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
